title: Track Concrete Cost Overrun
description: A project manager notices that concrete costs are trending over budget and needs to analyze the variance.

tasks.description: Retrieve the budgeted cost vs. actual cost for the 'Concrete' line item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves figures showing budgeted cost is $50,000 and actual cost to date is $65,000.

tasks.description: Generate a cost variance report for the concrete work.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is generated showing a negative variance of $15,000.
